Class GUICards

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.gui.util.GUICards
public class GUICards extends Object
GUICards represents the cards in the Graphical User Interface

    • initializePlayerCards

      public static void initializePlayerCards(javafx.scene.layout.Pane playerPane, List<ClientCard> cards, int cardWidth, int cardHeight, int distanceBetweenCards, javafx.scene.input.MouseButton flipButton)
      Initializes the cards of the player
      Parameters:
      playerPane - the player Pane
      cards - the cards inside the player's hand
      cardWidth - the width of the card
      cardHeight - the height of the card
      distanceBetweenCards - the distance between each card
      flipButton - the button that flips over tha cards

    • flipCard

      public static void flipCard(javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle rectangle, javafx.scene.input.MouseButton mouseButton, javafx.scene.paint.ImagePattern frontImage, javafx.scene.paint.ImagePattern backImage)
      Flips the cards over
      Parameters:
      rectangle - the rectangle in which the cards to be turned over are
      mouseButton - the mouse button that flips over the cards
      frontImage - the representation of the front side of the cards
      backImage - the representation of the reverse side of the cards
